cause.description:
The Alzheimer’s Association, the world leader in Alzheimer research and support, is the first and largest voluntary health organization dedicated to finding prevention methods, treatments and an eventual cure for Alzheimer’s.
For more than 25 years, the donor-supported, not-for-profit Alzheimer’s Association has provided reliable information and care consultation; created supportive services; increased funding for dementia research; and influenced public policy changes.
Memory Walk is a noncompetitive walk, and a festive event for families, coworkers, and friends of all ages.
Please join us in taking steps to end Alzheimer's.
1. Eliminate Alzheimer's disease through the advancement of research
2. Provide and enhance care and support for all affected by Alzheimer's disease
3. Reduce the risk of dementia through the promotion of brain health.
4. Our vision is a world without Alzheimer's disease.
cause.mission: help fight Alzheimer's and help those currently living with the disease.
